description: The Old Cuban cocktail is a summery drink that is immaculate and divine for anyone who loves sugary cocktails. The simple syrup and&nbsp;sparkling wine create an extra sweet foundation, while the amber&nbsp;rum and bitters round out the flavors.It's a full-bodied cocktail with a mint finish. Fresh mint complements this sweet beverage for the perfect cocktail on a warm-weather afternoon. Pour the mixed ingredients over ice cubes or frozen whiskey rocks.The Old Cuban is a great choice for any&nbsp;summer event, whether you're hosting a pool party or having friends over drinks.
name: The Old Cuban
